text:
通过门，我们探索外界并学习新事物，增长经验和知识，让自己更强大明智。 在努力工作的同时，把握这种机会并大胆展开冒险不仅可以丰富我们的人生，而且也能让我们找到真正的自我。
“有了窗，我们可以不必出去"，这句话则含有一种对内部世界的深度探索。 窗户代表着保持内心和平的态度。
我们不必为了寻找超出自我能力之外的东西而心
慌意乱，而可以通过窗来看到自己内心世界的美好。
trans:
Through doors, we explore the outside world and learn new things, grow in experience and knowledge, and become stronger and wiser. Seizing such opportunities and embarking on bold adventures while working hard will not only enrich our lives, but also allow us to find the true self.
On the other hand, "Having windows, we do not need to go out" contains a deep exploration of the inner world. The window represents the attitude of maintaining inner peace.
Instead of panicking about finding something beyond our ability to find ourselves,
we can look through the window and see the beauty of our inner world.
